1.title: Slovenia: the crow's flight

episode of.title: Wwii's great escapes: the freedom trails (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Monty treks through the forests and mountains of slovenia, as he learns the dramatic story of the most successful mass escape of allied prisoners in world war ii.

3.title: Italy: operation galia

episode of.title: Wwii's great escapes: the freedom trails (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Monty recounts the story of a daring sas mission behind enemy lines in northern italy, and retraces the troops' dramatic escape route across the apuan alps.

4.title: France and spain: the pyrenees

episode of.title: Wwii's great escapes: the freedom trails (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Monty retraces one of the toughest freedom trail routes in europe, across the pyrenees from france to spain, and meets soldiers who survived it and people who risked their lives to help them.

imdb.title: Wwii's great escapes: the freedom trails
akas: Wwii's great escapes: the freedom trails (United Kingdom)
plot: Former marine monty halls retraces the routes of great escapes from nazi territory, meeting surviving escapees and locals who risked their lives to help them.
